schema.answer: string - The main structured response with insights, tactics, and perspectives
schema.perspectives: array of objects - Each with guest_name (string), episode_title (string), company (string), insight (string)
schema.topics: array of strings - Growth topics covered
schema.follow_up_questions: array of strings - Suggested follow-up questions

sample_response.answer: Here are the key insights on PLG onboarding...

perspectives.insight: Focus on time-to-value, not feature completeness...

follow_up_questions: How do top companies measure activation?
